section.title:
work orders printing forms for
forms for work orders Print Work Order Form
section.para: To print a Work Order Form, select the "Print Work Order Form" option. The following screen will appear:
When printing a Work Order Form, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Enter the Work Order Number of the Work Order you want to print a Form for.
Displays Warehouse code automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Displays Item Number automatically when Work Order Number is entered into "Work Order #" field.
Select Form definition you want to use for the report.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without generating a report, returning you to the application desktop.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
